title: Shelf-Isolation Podcast: 1 - Field
description: In episode one of Shelf-Isolation, the unifying word is Field. A field is a kind of stage where the wildness of God and nature border the hard-won and provisional order of human  beings. Here we see English, Welsh, and American poets put this image to good use for their own visions.
